channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#1300; 07:52PM; NB 5 Fwy south of Antelope Valley Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Jgu2LY; #Sylmar; PRELIM: Four seriously injured patients (1 adult / 3 children), one of whom was briefly trapped in the wreckage, when a minivan struck the freeway center divider. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Media Inquiries: CHP Newhall Log #2415.; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 E18 E275 E298 E75 E91 EM14 EM15 EM17 HR3 RA18 RA7 RA75 RA87 RA91 T75 T98 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0782; 01:49PM; Topanga State Park; MAP: https://bit.ly/3TYDfO7; #Brentwood; LAFD ground and air response to an adult male hiker with an apparent left knee facture, in remote terrain between Sullivan Fire Road and Rustic Creek in Topanga State Park. An LAFD Rescue Helicopter was able to locate the hiker and lowered a Flight Paramedic to medically evaluate and stabilize the 58-year-old man, who will soon be hoisted aboard the hovering helicopter for in-flight care during direct transport to an an area hospital.; FS 19; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 11; BC9 E19 E269 H4 H5 HA4 HA5 RA19 RH114 T69; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#1498; 10:00PM; 310 W 82nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49BqMFy; #Florence; The injured adult female sustained a fractured arm when she apparently leapt from the second floor of the burning two-story building prior to firefighter's arrival. Her relationship to the site or incident have yet to be determined. She is currently in fair condition at an area hospital. No other injured persons were discovered. The cause of the fire remains under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E33 E46 E57 E64 EM13 RA264 RA64 RA833 SO1 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1498; 09:45PM; 310 W 82nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49BqMFy; #Florence; 40 LAFD Firefighters took just 17 minutes to access, confine and extinguish fire within the second floor rear of an apparently abandoned two-story home. One adult female civilian was discovered outside the building (unknown site or incident affiliation), with unspecified injury. She is being transported to an area hospital by LAFD Paramedics in yet undetermined condition. A search of the building and vicinity yielded no other patients. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E33 E46 E57 E64 EM13 RA264 RA64 RA833 SO1 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Structure Fire; INC#1498; 09:35PM; 310 W 82nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49BqMFy; #Florence; *Correction* Fire showing from the *second floor rear* of an apparently abandoned *two-story* home. One civilian discovered outside the building, being evaluated by LAFD Paramedics for unspecified injuries.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E33 E46 E57 E64 RA64 RA833 SO1 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1498; 09:28PM; 310 W 82nd St; MAP: https://bit.ly/49BqMFy; #Florence; PRELIM: Fire showing from the attic of a one-story vacant home.; FS 57; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 9; BC11 BC13 E233 E264 E33 E46 E57 E64 RA64 RA833 SO1 T33 T64; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1134; 05:54PM; 18309 W Chatsworth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3U0Mb5g; #PorterRanch; First arriving 28 LAFD Firefighters took just 15 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish a stove fire that extended to room contents and kitchen cabinetry within a 1,558 square foot one-story home with a pair of attached auxiliary dwelling units. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 E273 E287 E70 E8 E87 RA70 RA87 T73 T87; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1134; 05:39PM; 18309 W Chatsworth St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3U0Mb5g; #PorterRanch; PRELIM: Fire in one room at the front of a one-story home.; FS 70; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 BC15 E273 E287 E70 E8 E87 RA70 RA87 T73 T87; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0582; 10:56AM; Nichols Canyon; MAP: https://maps.app.goo.gl/gkedPrHBucgZqZUv7; #HollywoodHills West; LAFD ground and air response to an adult male hiker with an apparent ankle fracture, on the Lower Trebek Trail east of Nichols Canyon Road in the Santa Monica Mountains. The patient has been hoisted aboard a hovering LAFD rescue helicopter in fair condition and will receive continuing in-flight care from LAFD Flight Paramedics during direct helicopter transport to a regional trauma center. ; FS 41; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 4; AO1 AO2 BC5 E227 E27 E41 H4 H6 HA4 HA6 RA27 RH114 T27; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1141; 04:17PM; 3935 N Witzel Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3VTLYDB; #ShermanOaks; First arriving 30 LAFD Firefighters took just 28 minutes to access, confine and fully extinguish fire in the attic and wall space adjacent to the fireplace/chimney of a 3,397 square foot two story home. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 78; Batt 14; Valley Bureau; Council District 4; BC10 BC14 E102 E239 E278 E288 E99 RA878 RA99 T39 T78 T88; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey
